main event: Civilians observed two star-like lights in the northern sky for 10 minutes in Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The observation was made by civilians and lasted approximately 10 minutes., The objects were first seen stationary and then moved very rapidly before disappearing., The lights were described as looking like stars, with one being brighter than the other., There were no photographs taken during the observation., The report contains a detailed questionnaire filled out by the witness providing their testimony.
